replies.msg:
Be Water Brothers and Sisters.
In the coming Saturdays and Sundays, Brothers and Sisters should we all go to window shopping at the MTR mall in your neigbourhood? This reduces cost and lost of our precious siblings. The chain shops would give pressure to MTR and the bitch carrie. Please keep our power as the movement has a long way to go. The dawn is near but we still need to insist a long time before we can see it. Keep fighting Hong Kongers!
